import React, { useRef } from "react"; export const ProfileForm = ({firstName, lastName, about, github}) => { let form = useRef(null); const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const form_data = new FormData(form.current); let payload = {}; form_data.forEach(function (value, key) { payload[key] = value; }); // console.log("payload", payload); // Place your API call here to submit your payload. }; return (
